title: Must Read: Louis Vuitton Becomes Official Partner of Real Madrid, Net-a-Porter Hires Company Veterans for New Leadership Team
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. Louis Vuitton has entered a multiyear partnership with Real Madrid. The luxury brand also unveiled its formal wear and formal travel wear collections for the men's and women's football teams, as well as for the men's basketball team. ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
